name: Mycroft Holmes Simulator
description:
I'm currently developing THE BEEKEEPER'S PICNIC, a cosy mystery game featuring a retired Sherlock Holmes which you can wishlist on Steam. 

But is he really the BEST protagonist I could have chosen? Isn't there someone more intelligent, more dynamic, more mysterious, just waiting for his moment in the spotlight?

FEATURES OF MYCROFT HOLMES SIMULATOR 1895:

  • EXPLORE the Diogenes Club
  • WALK at a very leisurely pace!
  • BE QUIET and refuse to talk to a wide range of delightful characters!
  • OBSERVE things, without having to act on them!
  • MYSTERIES! There aren't any!

Hours of entertainment!***

*** Actually probably more like ten minutes. 

Frequently Asked Questions 

What do I do in this game?

You embody the magnificent gentleman that is Mr Mycroft Holmes. 

Ok but what are the goals of the game?

There aren't any. 

Wait, this can't possibly be set in 1895, because *pulls out Baring-Gould's annotated Sherlock Holmes*

Please have mercy

**************

Itch.io will prompt you to enter an amount for this silly little thing  - please feel completely guilt-free in selecting No thanks, just take me to the downloads! I have enabled the ability to be able to pay what you want due to previous requests from people who want to support my work.
